full_summary:
### Request for Information - Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton, ON

**MX-42892873550 - CFB Trenton, ON RFI**

**Publication Date:** October 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 2, 2023, 2:00:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** November 2, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** November 2, 2023

**Purpose of this Request for Information**

This is a non-binding Request for Information (RFI) issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) to determine potential interest and opportunities in supporting the department. The solicitation for goods and services is not necessarily tied to this RFI.

**Objectives of the RFI**

1. Identify potential bidders for the acquisition of up to 60 housing units within the identified geographic boundary (Annex A).
2. Determine interest in constructing and/or managing residential housing at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton.

**Description of the Program and Services**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire up to 60 housing units to support its activities at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton. The department is also interested in identifying potential bidders for the construction and management of residential housing within the identified geographic boundary.

**Submission Requirements**

Firms interested in providing services are invited to submit their responses to the RFI electronically. The submission deadline is November 2, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM EST. Please submit responses to [Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca).

**Questions and Contact Information**

Any questions regarding this RFI should be addressed to Steve Kennedy, Technical Specialist, Procurement, Defence Construction Canada, at [Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca) or (613) 769-2659.

Note: The original RFI document has been condensed to meet the 400-word limit. Relevant details and information have been preserved while removing unnecessary information.

### Additional Information

- Documents and questions are available for download on the MERX website ([www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)).
- Fees may apply for accessing documents on the MERX website.
- The solicitation for goods and services is not necessarily tied to this RFI.
